Title: Over the Misty Mountains Grim
Product: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo Baggins

Text: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo Baggins

Text: Bilbo Baggins does not count against the hero limit and cannot gain resources from non-treasure cards.
The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Spend 1 Baggins resource to search your deck for a treasure card and add it to your hand.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players have lost the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Glamdring

Text: Attach to a hero or Gandalf.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.
Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Sting

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack, and +1 Defense.
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card`s Threat.
Front.FlavorText: `I shall call you Sting.` -Bilbo, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Orcrist

Text: Attach to a hero.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero`s resource pool.
Front.FlavorText: `This, Thorin, the runes name Orcrist, the Goblin-cleaver in the ancient tongue of Gondolin; it was a famous blade.` -Elrond, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo's Magic Ring

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Exhaust Bilbo`s Magic Ring and raise your threat by 1 to gain 1 Baggins resource. (Limit once per round.)
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust Bilbo`s Magic Ring and raise your threat by 3 to cancel all damage from this attack.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Mithril Shirt

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Attached hero gets +1 Defense and +1 hit point.
Front.FlavorText:
`Mr. Baggins!` he cried. `Here is the first payment of your reward! Cast off your old coat and put on this!`
-Thorin, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Golden Cup

Text: Attach to a hero.
Action: Add Thror`s Golden Cup to the victory display to draw 3 cards.
Front.FlavorText:
...the great golden cup of Thror, two-handed, hammered and carven with birds and flowers whose eyes and petals were of jewels...
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Hunting Bow

Text: Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gains Ranged.
When making a ranged attack, attached hero gets +2 Attack.
Front.FlavorText:
Thorin seized a bow of horn and shot an arrow at the speaker.
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: The Arkenstone

Text: Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust The Arkenstone and raise your threat by X to lower by X the cost of the next ally you play this phase that matches the attached hero`s sphere.
Front.FlavorText:
`...the Heart of the Mountain; and it is also the heart of Thorin. He values it above a rive of gold.`
-Bilbo, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Battle Axe

Text: Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gets +2 Attack.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy engaged with you.
Front.FlavorText:
Royal indeed did Thorin look, clad in a coat of gold-plated rings, with a silver hafted axe...
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: A Short Rest

Text: Setup: Shuffle the Over the Misty Mountains Grim and Western Lands encounter sets into one encounter deck and make it the active encounter deck. Then, shuffle the The Great Goblin and Misty Mountain Goblins encounter sets into a second encounter deck and set it aside, inactive.
Front.FlavorText: After a refreshing stay in the House of Elrond, Bilbo and his companions resumed their quest for the Lonely Mountain. But to reach Erebor, they first had to climb the high pass over the Misty Mountains.

Text: When Revealed: Each player may search his deck for 1 treasure card and add it to his hand, then shuffle his deck. Advance to stage 2A.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: A Suspicious Crow

Text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals at least 1 damage, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Cave Entrance

Text: While Cave Entrance is in the staging area, it gains: `Forced: At the end of the round, place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.`

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Chaos in the Cavern

Text: When Revealed: All engaged enemies return to the staging area. Then, each Goblin enemy gets +1 Threat until the end of the phase.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy is returned to the staging area after its attack resolves.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Down, Down to Goblin Town

Text: When Revealed: Shuffle all encounter cards back into the encounter deck and set it aside, inactive. The second encounter deck becomes the active encounter deck. Search the encounter deck for The Great Goblin and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
Front.FlavorText: Out jumped the goblins, big goblins, great ugly-looking goblins, lots of goblins, before you could say rocks and blocks. - The Hobbit

Text: Players cannot defeat this stage unless The Great Goblin is in the victory display.
When Revealed: Reveal 3 encounter cards per player, Bilbo Baggins may spend X resources to reduce the total number of encounter cards revealed by X. (To a minimum of 1.)
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Dreary Hills

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Dreary Hills, each player must discard 1 card at random from his hand.
Response: After Dreary Hills leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Front Porch

Text: While Front Porch is the active location, players cannot attack Goblin enemies.
Action: The first player may spend 2 Baggins resources to treat Front Porch`s printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Galloping Boulders

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a questing character. That character takes 3 damage and is removed from the quest.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Put this card on top of the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Goblin Axeman

Text: Goblin Axeman gets +1 Attack for each Cave location in play.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Goblin Bent-Swords

Text: If The Great Goblin is in the victory display, this card gains surge.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Attack. (+2 Attack instead if The Great Goblin is in the victory display.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Goblin Driver

Text: When Revealed: The first player exhausts 1 character he controls.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts 1 character he controls.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Goblin Miners

Text: Goblin Miners gets +1 Defense for each Cave location in play.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Goblin Runners

Front.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one. (Deal a new shadow card for that attack.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Great Cavern Room

Text: While Great Cavern Room is the active location, it gains: `Forced: After a player engages a Goblin enemy, he must deal 1 damage to a character he controls.`Forced: When faced with the option to travel, if The Great Goblin is in the victory display the players must travel to Great Cavern Room if able.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Grip, Grab! Pinch, Nab!

Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must choose 1 Goblin enemy from the discard pile and add it to the staging area.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player deals damage among characters he controls equal to the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Guffawing of Giants

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 Stone-giant in the staging area. At the end of the quest phase, that Stone-giant engages the player with the highest threat. If there are no Stone-giant cards in the staging area, search the encounter deck for 1 Stone-giant and add it to the staging area.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Lone-Lands

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Lone-Lands, each player removes 1 resource from one of his hero`s resource pools, if able.
Response: After Lone-Lands leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: More Like a Grocer

Text: When Revealed: Discard all Baggins resources.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve this card`s `When Revealed` effect.
Front.FlavorText: `As soon as I clapped eyes on the little fellow bobbing and puffing on the mat, I had my doubts. He looks more like a grocer than a burglar!` -Glóin The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: No Campfire

Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose one: increase his threat by 4, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 2.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Overhanging Rock

Text: While Overhanging Rock is the active location, it gains: `Action: Spend 1 Baggins resource to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those to your hand and discard the other.`
Front.FlavorText: `This won`t do at all!` said Thorin. `If we don`t get blown off or drowned, or struck by lightning, we shall be picked up by some giant and kicked sky-high for a football.` -Thorin Oakenshield, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Stone-Giant

Text: While at least one Stone-Giant is in the staging area, the Galloping Boulders card gains surge.
Forced: After Stone-Giant engages a player, that player chooses and discards 1 ally he controls.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: The Goblins' Caves

Text: While The Goblins` Caves is the active location, Goblin enemies get +1 Threat.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by X. X is the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: The Great Goblin

Text: Forced: After The Great Goblin attacks, discard X cards from the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each Goblin enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: The High Pass

Text: X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress tokens from the current quest.
Front.FlavorText: There were many paths that led up into those mountains, and many passes over them. But most of the paths were cheats and deceptions and led nowhere or to bad ends. -The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: The Mountain Pass

Front.FlavorText: When he peeped out in the lightning-flashes, he saw that across the valley the stone-giants were out and were hurling rocks at one another for a game, and catching them, and tossing them down into the darkness where they smashed the trees far below, or splintered into little bits with a bang. - The Hobbit

Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Stone-giant and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Wind-whipped Rain

Text: When Revealed: Discard all non-treasure, non-objective attachments in play.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending character gets -1 Defense.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill
